To run an agent, execute:
java -jar AgentLauncher.jar <username> <password> <UUID>

Pre-existing agent accounts:
bradybot0, bradybot0, abcdefghijklmnop
bradybot1, bradybot1, qrstuvwxyz012345

Additional agent accounts can be created by signing into web client, and navigating to My Account-->Profile

Try whispering to an agent 'What's the weather in X?' or 'Create a new room named Y'
